name: WingMan alpha 1.0
description:
Note:

In case it does not say in the game you can move the camera around the map by holding down the right mouse button and then using the arrow keys or WASD. While holding the right mouse button you can also adjust the angle of your view and how far you are zoomed in.

The game is still being developed so it may be a bit buggy and the AI is not very functional at the moment. Hopefully you can still find some enjoyment in the game and please do not hesitate to let me know on anything you would like to see changed in the future.
